ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
8 slices OSCAR MAYER Bacon, cooked, crumbled
⅓ cup KRAFT Grated Parmesan Cheese
2 (8 ounce) packages refrigerated crescent dinner rolls

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese at room temperature for easy mixing with other ingredients
Cool bacon completely before crumbling to prevent oil from melting the cheese
Spread filling carefully to avoid tearing the delicate crescent dough
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How much filling should you use per crescent to ensure they bake evenly without leaking?
